Subject: IMPORTANT & URGENT: VOB Survey 2025 | Country Management - UAE
--------------------------------------------------
Dear team addressed on bcc (Country Management in UAE ,

 

Kindly complete VOB earliest as it is still pending from you end, if you received this email then it is not completed yet from your side and it is your opportunity to rate the services provided by different departments in our group.

 

The deadline is extended to July 15th for now (instead of June 30th initially set).

 

Thank you for your prompt action. 

 

Dear Sumaiya,

 

Kindly share the updated list by of next Thursday.

Subject: IMPORTANT & URGENT: VOB Survey 2025 | Country Management - UAE

 

Dear Nasser,

I hope my email finds you well.

 

I am reaching out to you to seek your support in encouraging the teams under Country management – UAE to complete the VOB Survey 2025.

Each piece of feedback is important to help build best-in-class operations for our businesses.

I attach the excel file shared for the list of individuals pending their completion for the VOB Survey. 

The deadline is extended to July 15th for now (instead of June 30th initially set).

 

Adding the below for your reference,

This is the response rate for UAE under country management.



 

Thanks a lot for your continued support on this !

 

Best,

Sumaiya
